items.sentence: We should teach our kids about the dangers of smoking.
Don\'t you remember how bad Tom is at speaking French?
When was the last time you received a letter from Tom?
I immediately ran downstairs to see what was going on.
Tom probably doesn\'t even know why I don\'t like him.
Tom offered Mary his arm and they walked off together.
Tom opened the cabinet drawer and pulled out a folder.
Tom opened the clothes dryer and took out his clothes.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t like Mary very much.
Tom may look smart, but he\'s actually not very smart.
